name: Simply Potatoes® Cheesy Hash Browns
author: Simply Potatoes
summary: Hash browns baked with cream of chicken soup, sour cream and cheese is a popular church basement side dish.  You can't go wrong with this recipe!
ingredients: 1 (20 ounce) package Simply Potatoes® Shredded Hash Browns
1 (10.75 ounce) can  cream of chicken soup
2 cups Crystal Farms® Shredded Cheddar Cheese
¼ cup butter or margarine, melted
1 ½ cups corn flakes, coarsely crushed
directions: Spray 2 quart glass baking dish with nonstick cooking spray
In large bowl combine all hash brown ingredients; mix well
In small bowl stir together topping ingredients
Spread topping evenly over hash browns
Bake 45 minutes or until hash browns are tender
